ARABIC: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In this way Allah makes His Signs clear to you, so that hopefully you will use your intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So does God pronounce His decrees that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus Allah makes clear His commandments for you: it is expected that you will use your common sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus does God explain His revelations to you so that perhaps you will have understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how Allah explains His verses to you so that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus Allah makes clear His Ayat (Laws) to you, in order that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah thus makes clear to you His communications that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So God makes clear His signs for you; haply you will understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus Allah expoundeth unto you His revelations so that ye may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus God makes His commandments clear to you, so that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise Allah expoundeth unto you His commandments, haply ye may reflect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus does Allah clarify His signs to you so that you may exercise your reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus doth Allah Make clear His Signs to you: In order that ye may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus Allah makes clear His Ayat (Laws) to you, in order that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Like this Allah clarifies to you His verses in order that you understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God thus explains His revelations to you, so that you may understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses that you might use reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:242] So, in the same way that He has explained to you what has been mentioned, God makes clear His signs for you, so that you might understand, reflect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus Allah expoundeth unto you His revelations) His commands and prohibitions (so that ye may understand) what you have been commanded to do.
